divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a reddish-orange stationary star-like object on the night sky as I entered the terrace. I thought, it is too big and bright to be Mars so I took binoculars to watch it closely. I decided to go inside again in order to charge the camera battery and take an astronomical telescope. It was not there when I came back. After the sighting I drove outside the city to take a few nigh sky photographs. Then I got to a pub where I told the story to some people.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Liptovský Mikuláš
This sighting has never been favorited.
